main event: A civilian observed a bright star-like object moving in a northerly direction for approximately 5-7 minutes in Medway, Ohio.
interesting points: The observed object was initially thought to be a satellite but was moving too quickly for that classification,The observer noted that a plane was also visible moving in an oval direction,The object appeared fuzzy and reddish-orange in color,Estimated speed of the object was approximately 2-3 times that of a jet aircraft,The observer indicated the object moved behind and in front of something during the sighting.
